about_the_game:
Get ready for an all-new challenge in this three-dimensional interpretation of the cult series "That Level Again".

"That Level Again 3D" is a bold reimagining of the original concept, inspired by the cult series of games, providing players with the opportunity to experience familiar puzzles in a new dimension.

Key Features:

  • Three-Dimensional Puzzles: Explore the world of "That Level Again" with a new perspective. Each level is presented in a three-dimensional space, adding depth and complexity to the original puzzles.
  • Unique Mechanics: The game offers unique three-dimensional mechanics and puzzles that will make you think in new ways. Discover new ways to overcome obstacles and achieve goals.
  • Innovative Approach: A new interpretation of familiar levels will make you reconsider solutions and strategies presented in the original series of games.
  • Dive into the world of "That Level Again 3D" and experience familiar puzzles in a completely new format. Are you ready for the challenge of three-dimensional levels?

name: That Level Again 3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through 3D puzzles inspired by the cult classic series. Explore unique mechanics and conquer challenging levels in this innovative twist on the original concept.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
